Detailed Description

Encapsulation of OCTEON mailbox interrupts.

Define Documentation

#define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_ADDCORES   2
#define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_REMOVECORES   1
#define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_SHUTDOWN   0

Mailbox bit numbers used by simple-executive, and a few mailbox numbers available for the user application.

Function Documentation

void cvmx_mbox_initialize ( uint32_t  mbox_mask  ) 

Initialize the mailbox interrupt system for the specified bits.

Parameters:
mbox_mask a bitmask of the mailbox bits that will be used by the program.
int cvmx_mbox_num_bits ( void   ) 

Return the number of usable mailbox bits in the system.

Returns:
The hardware dependent number of mailbox bits.

Variable Documentation

CVMX_SHARED void(* cvmx_mbox_register)(unsigned int bit, struct cvmx_mbox *handler)

Register a mailbox interrupt handler for the specified interrupt number.

Parameters:
bit Mailbox bit to register a handler for.
handler Handler information.
CVMX_SHARED void(* cvmx_mbox_signal)(unsigned int bit, unsigned int core)

Signal a mailbox interrupt handler for the specified bit and core.

Parameters:
bit Mailbox bit to signal.
core The core to signal.
